name: machine-learning-assistant
description: Production-grade machine learning plugin with 7 specialized agents and 7 skills covering ML fundamentals, supervised/unsupervised learning, deep learning, NLP, computer vision, and model deployment
author: Plugin Agent Marketplace

commands.name: learn
commands.description: Start a learning path and get recommendations based on your goals

commands.name: explore
commands.description: Explore all available agents and their specialized areas

commands.name: roadmap
commands.description: Find and analyze specific ML learning roadmaps

commands.name: skills
commands.description: Browse and discover available ML skills by agent

commands.name: trending
commands.description: Discover trending ML technologies and techniques

commands.name: projects
commands.description: Browse ML projects organized by difficulty and topic

commands.name: compare
commands.description: Compare different ML algorithms, frameworks, and approaches

commands.name: career-path
commands.description: Get personalized ML/AI career path recommendations
